docs.title: What is this place?
docs.text:
The purpose of this website is to collect good looking plots

You will not learn that much

Enjoy and relax

docs.title: How to submit
docs.text:
You can submit your plot sending an email to martplotlib@gmail.com.

The submission should include code selfcontained.

Include also a requirements.txt if you are using exotic packages.

# Exmaple
import numpy as np

def my_plot():
    x = np.linspace(0, 10, 1000)
    y = np.random.randn(1000)
    plt.scatter(x, y, alpha=.8, color='blue', edgecolors='black')
    plt.grid(linestyle=':')

if __name__ == '__main__':
    my_plot()

docs.title: Mockup plot page
docs.text:
import numpy as np

def my_plot():
    x = np.linspace(0, 10, 1000)
    y = np.random.randn(1000)
    plt.scatter(x, y, alpha=.8, color='blue', edgecolors='black')
    plt.grid(linestyle=':')

if __name__ == '__main__':
    my_plot()
